channel.title: [Class Suggestions] Converted Neutrals
channel.description:
I saw Moleland's ideas for converted neutrals, but I thought Alchemist deserved it's own class conversion, and that a Fool conversion had potential too.
Converted Alchemist: >## [color=purple]The Diviner[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Coagulate (Passive)** - You are immune to bleeding and nightshade poison. **Gargoyle Potion (Night)** - Turns a player to stone for the night, occupying them. - Infinite uses. **Nightmare Potion (Night)** - Gives the target player nightmares, causing them to be too afraid to vote tomorrow. - 3 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
Converted Scorned: >## [color=purple]The Vengeful[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] **Passion (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Troll Box (Day)** - Choose a target player and whisper a short phrase into the troll box. It will appear as if that player said it. - Infinite uses. **Plant (Night)** - Plant incriminating evidence on a player, making them appear as The Assassin to investigative abiltiies. - Infinite uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
Converted Fool: >## [color=purple]The Trickster[/color] >[color=purple]**Unseen Offensive**[/color] **Trickery (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Troll Box (Day)** - Choose a target player and whisper a short phrase into the troll box. It will appear as if that player said it. - Infinite uses. **Surprise Mojo (Night)** - Replace a player's abilities with fireworks, occupying them. - Infinite uses. **Masquerade (Night)** - You can choose a class you wish to appear as to investigative abilities tonight. Additionally, if you die, you will appear as the chosen class. - 3 uses. *Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*

item.title: [Class Suggestions] Converted Neutrals
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Insanity:

Who will ever poison their own teammate?

Maybe there will be more poisoners in future

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestions] Converted Neutrals
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I’m not sure if fool should be convertible, the alchemist converted class needs a power that looks like it heals because otherwise it can’t fake being an alchemist still.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestions] Converted Neutrals
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
Herbalist has nightshade immunity too, even though there’s no way they could be poisoned by it in the current game. Just in case of changes essentially ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

item.title: [Class Suggestions] Converted Neutrals
item.dc:creator: Ashe
item.description:
I saw Moleland’s ideas for converted neutrals, but I thought Alchemist deserved it’s own class conversion, and that a Fool conversion had potential too.

Converted Alchemist:

The Diviner

Unseen Offensive
Coagulate (Passive) - You are immune to bleeding and nightshade poison.
Gargoyle Potion (Night) - Turns a player to stone for the night, occupying them. - Infinite uses.
Nightmare Potion (Night) - Gives the target player nightmares, causing them to be too afraid to vote tomorrow. - 3 uses.
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Converted Scorned:

The Vengeful

Unseen Social
Passion (Passive) - Immune to occupation.
Troll Box (Day) - Choose a target player and whisper a short phrase into the troll box. It will appear as if that player said it. - Infinite uses.
Plant (Night) - Plant incriminating evidence on a player, making them appear as The Assassin to investigative abiltiies. - Infinite uses.
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Converted Fool:

The Trickster

Unseen Offensive
Trickery (Passive) - Immune to occupation.
Troll Box (Day) - Choose a target player and whisper a short phrase into the troll box. It will appear as if that player said it. - Infinite uses.
Surprise Mojo (Night) - Replace a player’s abilities with fireworks, occupying them. - Infinite uses.
Masquerade (Night) - You can choose a class you wish to appear as to investigative abilities tonight. Additionally, if you die, you will appear as the chosen class. - 3 uses.
Defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.

Read full topic
